      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env that implement EnvironmentBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EnvironmentBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  SimpleEnvironmentBuilder<P>
      Builds the PropertyResolver: If a custom resolver is defined, use it directly If no custom resolver, use the JavaPropertiesResolver with merged Properties and converter instance provided by Builder.build()
